name: A Better Twitter (2020)
description: Minor changes to the Twitter Web interface to make it cleaner. Works for any font and color setting.
additional_info:
1.4
Padding for "What's happening" box is fixed.
1.3
Simplified the padding, changed the box-shadow, and removed the border-top-left and right radii on the "More" menu.

Added the reply line back.

Released.

Without the new Twitter layout's existence, this style wouldn't exist. Thank you for downloading it.
